definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The recovered sodium cyanide and sodium cuprous cyanide can be directly returned to the plating tank.
sentences.chinese: 再生回收的氰化鈉和銅氰化鈉可直接在鍍槽內回用。

sentences.english: The recovered sodium cyanide and sodium cuprous cyanide can be directly returned to the plating tank.
